welcome__subtext-first:
A world of sweets gathered in one place
More than 300 products available.
welcome__subtext-second:
We carefully collect colorful sweets from all over the world and turn them
into a ready-made assortment for stores. Our sweets delight children,
decorate shelves, and help businesses sell easily and with pleasure.
corn_tubes_milk_cream_filling: Corn sticks with milk cream filling
corn_tubes_milk_cream_filling_text:
Crispy TWIN corn sticks are a great choice for a snack at work or on the go.
Their light texture makes them easy to enjoy and digest.
Soft and airy filling delights with its rich flavor.
Glazed Wafer Sticks 'PYRAMID'_filling_te: The pyramids have a simple and clear composition. Delicate flavors and bright design make these crispy pyramids especially attractive. Convenient to take on the go or give to a child for a school snack.
Affordability is the main advantage of our product.
Damla Assorti tubes: Sour gummy tubes assortment, 30 g pack
Damla Assorti tubes_filling_text: A mix of tropical, raspberry, blackberry, strawberry and apple flavors. These gummies plunge any sweet lover into a gummy euphoria. Each color has its own flavor. Coated with sweet-and-sour powder for a bright taste experience.
Chewy Gummy Bears Assortment 80g_filling: Refreshing sour notes with flavors of apple, cherry, strawberry, lemon, orange, raspberry, grape, blackcurrant and cola. Fun DAMLA GUMMY figures in bright colors are impossible to resist!
Natural ingredients and a recipe perfected by the factory for over 65 years.
sour_gummy_straps_15g_filling_text: Light gummy texture with a soft base. Sour coating adds a pleasant taste to strawberry marmalade, making it a true bestseller.
sour_gummy_straps_15g_filling_text-secon: Made from natural ingredients with real juice, loved by both adults and children.
card__popular-item-Damla Sour 90gr_filli: DAMLA SOUR is an assortment of fruit-flavored candies with a sour powder filling. Soft, chewy texture that doesn’t stick to teeth and gradually раскрывает fruit flavors.
Packaging format: bag with euro slot, convenient for checkout zones and shelves.
Jimmy belts_filling_text: Perfect for a small snack. Tropical, raspberry, blackberry, strawberry and apple flavors. Coated with sweet-and-sour powder. Made with natural juice.
Jimmy chocolate: Milk chocolate with milk filling, 20 g
Jimmy chocolate_filling_text: Milk chocolate JIMMY MILKY with delicate milk filling. Convenient format and low calories. An affordable alternative on the market.
Jimmy belts_filling_text-second: Affordability is the main advantage of our product.
Crispy delight, creamy heart: Biscuit sticks with hazelnut cream, 52 g
Crispy delight, creamy heart_filling_tex: The perfect snack combining crispy biscuit sticks and light chocolate-hazelnut cream. Contains natural hazelnut paste.
Lower price than competitors, with superior taste in comparative tastings.
Jimmy pencil 75gr_filling_text: Colorful pencil-shaped gummies with filling. Balanced sweetness with fruity flavors and a pleasant sour note.
Kidzi_klubnika_filling_text: Soft chewy cubes inspired by Turkish lokum traditions. EXTRA sour gummies delight sweet lovers of all ages.
Kidzi_klubnika_filling_text-second: Affordability is the main advantage of our product.
Miskets_Sour-cubes: Sour lokum cubes in crispy glaze assortment
Miskets_Sour-cubes_filling_text: Soft chewy cubes with Turkish lokum texture and EXTRA sour taste.
Miskets_Sour-cubes_filling_text-second: Affordability is the main advantage of our product.
Dubai-cake_filling_text: ARRIVO Dubai cake combines biscuit base, pistachios, crispy kataifi and pistachio cream, topped with chocolate. A perfect balance of textures and flavors.
Coffee-İntense-90gr_filling_text: Coffee Intense candies deliver a rich Turkish coffee taste with cream. Individually wrapped, convenient for travel.
partners-subtitle: Over 25 years of successful work, we have earned the trust of more than 25,000 clients, including industry leaders:
Marmalade-subtext: Chewy, sour and sweet, jelly, shaped
candy-subtext: With and without filling, gift sets
Cookies-marshmallows-subtext: A variety of shapes and flavors
Jelly desserts-subtext: A variety of shapes and flavors
categories__subtitle: Factory products offer a wide selection of confectionery, natural marmalade in various flavors and shapes. Certified IFS, HALAL, EAC.
benefit_worldwide_quality: Global quality standards and modern recipes
